metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0468 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in io_uring/poll.c in io_poll_check_eventsin the io_uring subcomponent in the Linux Kernel due to a race condition ofpoll_refs. This flaw may cause a NULL pointer dereference.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
